title: Introduce Your Family Members
desc: Describe your family members including siblings, parents, and relatives.
prompt_en: Tell me about your family members. Who are they and what are they like?
prompt_zh: 請介紹你的家人。他們是誰？他們是什麼樣的人？
sample_questions: How many siblings do you have?
What do your parents do for a living?
Do you have any nieces or nephews?

title: Describe Your Mom
desc: Talk about your mother's appearance, personality, hobbies, and profession.
prompt_en: Describe your mom's appearance, personality, hobbies, and job.
prompt_zh: 描述你媽媽的外貌、個性、興趣和工作。
sample_questions: What does your mom look like?
What kind of person is your mom?
What are your mom's hobbies?
What is your mom's job?

title: Describe Your Dad
desc: Share details about your father's appearance, personality, job, and interests.
prompt_en: Tell me about your dad's appearance, personality, and job.
prompt_zh: 告訴我你爸爸的外貌、個性和工作。
sample_questions: Do you look like your dad?
What is your dad's personality like?
What does your dad do for work?
Does your dad have any hobbies?

title: Talk About Your Siblings
desc: Discuss your brothers and sisters, their personalities, and your relationship with them.
prompt_en: Describe your siblings and your relationship with them.
prompt_zh: 描述你的兄弟姐妹以及你們之間的關係。
sample_questions: How many brothers and sisters do you have?
What do your siblings do?
Do you get along well with your siblings?
What are your siblings like?

title: Family Hobbies and Interests
desc: Share what hobbies and interests your family members have in common or individually.
prompt_en: What hobbies or interests do your family members have?
prompt_zh: 你的家人有哪些共同或個別的興趣和嗜好？
sample_questions: Does your family enjoy any activities together?
Are there any hobbies that run in your family?
What does each family member like to do in their free time?

title: Family Members' Professions
desc: Describe the jobs and careers of your family members.
prompt_en: Tell me about the professions of your family members.
sample_questions: What does your dad do for work?
What is your mom's profession?
Do your siblings have jobs?
What does your brother-in-law do?

title: Family Bonding and Traditions
desc: Talk about how your family bonds and any special family traditions you have.
prompt_en: How does your family spend time together and bond?
prompt_zh: 你的家人如何共度時光並建立感情？有什麼特別的家庭傳統嗎？
sample_questions: Do you have family dinners?
What activities do you do together as a family?
Are there any special traditions in your family?

title: Family Personality Traits
desc: Describe the personality traits of your family members and how they differ or are similar.
prompt_en: Describe the personalities of your family members and how they compare.
prompt_zh: 描述你家人的個性特質，他們有什麼相似或不同之處？
sample_questions: Who is the quiet one in your family?
Who is the most outgoing?
Do you share personality traits with your parents?

title: Family Members' Future Plans
desc: Discuss any future plans or important life events your family members have.
prompt_en: What future plans or important events are your family members preparing for?
prompt_zh: 你的家人有哪些未來計劃或重要的人生事件？
sample_questions: Is anyone in your family getting married soon?
What are your siblings planning for their future?
Do your parents have any upcoming plans?

title: Favorite Family Memories
desc: Share your favorite memories or stories about your family.
prompt_en: Tell me about your favorite memories with your family.
prompt_zh: 分享你與家人最喜歡的回憶或故事。
sample_questions: What is a fun memory you have with your siblings?
Do you have any special family traditions?
What was a memorable family event?
